trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to download the contents of a file to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous operation to download the contents of a file to a byte array.

trans-unit.source: The starting offset in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: The starting offset in the byte array.

trans-unit.source: The starting offset of the data range, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The starting offset of the data range, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: The length of the data to download from the file, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The length of the data to download from the file, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the file.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the file.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.File.FileRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.File.FileRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: The callback delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.
trans-unit.target: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
